text: Ayatollah Mohammad-Ali Movahedi Kermani (; born 1932) is an Iranian politician and cleirc. He is Tehran's Friday Prayer Ephemeral Imam. He is also the former secretary-general of Combatant Clergy Association. He is also a member of the Assembly of Experts. He was formerly one of the deputy speakers in the Islamic Consultative Assembly. In May 2024, he became the Chairman of the Assembly of Experts. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian Islamic religious leaders Category:Iranian politicians
title: Mohammad-Ali Movahedi Kermani
